article_title: Frugal or faulty? The cost of mental health in Connecticut

og.description: The theme for the day was health, and the budgets of the Department of Public Health, the Department of Developmental Services, the Department of Veterans’ Affairs and the Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services were the topics of discussion. In short, they were being slashed.
og.title: UP CLOSE: Frugal or faulty? The cost of mental health in Connecticut
